Whenever Calamarie attacks, you may create a Lackey Role token attached to target creature defending player controls. If you do, create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token for each Lackey Role token you control. [i](Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this token leaves play, draw a card.)[/i]
